Key Match Events: Mitchell Santner took 2 wickets for 11 runs in 4 overs
Michael Bracewell took 2 wickets for 31 runs in 4 overs
Arshdeep Singh conceded 27 runs in the 20th over
Washington Sundar was dismissed by Lockie Ferguson
Hardik Pandya and Suryakumar Yadav staged a mini-recovery for India
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya confirmed Shubman Gill will start ahead of Prithvi Shaw
Post-Match Reflections: Daryl Mitchell expressed satisfaction in contributing to the score and praised the team's bowling
Mitchell Santner was surprised by the amount of spin in the second innings and praised Daryl Mitchell's batting
Hardik Pandya acknowledged the surprising pitch conditions and praised Washington Sundar's performance
Michael Bracewell mentioned the importance of bouncing back after a disappointing one-day series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at JSCA International Stadium Complex, Ranchi
India elected to field first after winning the toss
New Zealand led the 3-match series 1-0 after this match
